text: Spark Masayuki Matsunaga (October 8, 1916April 15, 1990) was an American politician. He was United States Senator for Hawaii from 1977 until his death in 1990. He was a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:1990 deaths Category:United States senators from Hawaii Category:United States representatives from Hawaii Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Deaths from bone cancer Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa alumni
title: Spark Matsunaga
